Directions: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat in egg and vanilla. Combine flour, coconut, baking powder and salt; gradually add to the creamed mixture. Shape into 1-in. balls. Place 1-1/2 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets; flatten with a glass dipped in flour. Bake at 350 degrees F for 12-14 minutes or until edges are very light brown. Cool on wire racks.

In a mixing bowl, combine the first four filling ingredients; beat until smooth. Place 1/2 teaspoon preserves and a scant teaspoon of filling on the bottom of half of the cookies; top with remaining cookies.
